name: rrpsscn

body.origin:
|- wss(crp, cc)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
-| diffsc(hs0, crp)
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ → hs0 ∈ ℂ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crp, cc)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
-| diffsc(hs0, crp)
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ → hs0 ∈ ℂ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crp, cc)
-| diffsc(hs0, crp)
-| diffsc(hs0, cc)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, ℂ)

comment: The positive reals are a subset of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
